Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.library.checkout.user.UserService
public class UserService extends Object
Interfaces with user database to serialize users and provide a CRUD API for them
Author:
Cameron Peek

      public void addUser(String username, String password, String role)
      Adds and serializes a new user
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the new user
      password - Password of the new user
      role - Role of the new user

    • updateUserById

      public void updateUserById(int id, User newUser)
      Updates and serializes a user
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the user to be updated
      newUser - The new User object containing the updated user info

      Parameters:
      id - ID of the user to be found
      Returns:
      An Optional<User> containing the User if it exists.
